Package org.attribyte.snook

Class ErrorHandler

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.ErrorHandler
org.attribyte.snook.ErrorHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.jetty.server.Request.Handler, org.eclipse.jetty.util.thread.Invocable
public class ErrorHandler extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.ErrorHandler
An error handler that enables custom responses with any content type.

  • Field Details

    • cacheControlHeader

      public final String cacheControlHeader
      The value sent with the cache control header. If null or empty, the header will not be sent.

    • withStackTrace

      public final boolean withStackTrace
      Should stack traces be included?

    • withServletName

      public final boolean withServletName
      Should the servlet name be included?

    • logger

      public final org.attribyte.api.Logger logger
      An optional logger.

    • overrideWriters

      public final com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<Map.Entry<String,ErrorHandler.Writer>> overrideWriters
      A list of path prefix, writer pairs - matched in order.

    • DEFAULT_CACHE_CONTROL_HEADER

      public static final String DEFAULT_CACHE_CONTROL_HEADER
      "must-revalidate,no-cache,no-store"
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DEFAULT_CHARSET

  • Constructor Details

    • ErrorHandler

      public ErrorHandler(String cacheControlHeader, ErrorHandler.Writer defaultWriter, boolean withStackTrace, org.attribyte.api.Logger logger, Map<String,ErrorHandler.Writer> overrideWriters)
      Creates an error handler with a map of overrides.
      Parameters:
      cacheControlHeader - The cache control header value.
      defaultWriter - The default writer.
      withStackTrace - Should stack traces be sent to the client?
      logger - A logger.
      overrideWriters - A map (that should preserve iteration order for entries) of writer vs prefix to override output type for paths. May be null.

    • ErrorHandler

      public ErrorHandler(String cacheControlHeader, ErrorHandler.Writer defaultWriter, boolean withStackTrace, org.attribyte.api.Logger logger, Collection<Map.Entry<String,ErrorHandler.Writer>> overrideWriters)
      Creates an error handler with a list of overrides.
      Parameters:
      cacheControlHeader - The cache control header value.
      defaultWriter - The default writer.
      withStackTrace - Should stack traces be sent to the client?
      logger - A logger.
      overrideWriters - A list of prefix, writers to override output type for paths. May be null.

    • ErrorHandler

      public ErrorHandler(String cacheControlHeader, ErrorHandler.Writer defaultWriter, boolean withStackTrace, boolean withServletName, org.attribyte.api.Logger logger, Collection<Map.Entry<String,ErrorHandler.Writer>> overrideWriters)
      Creates an error handler with a list of overrides.
      Parameters:
      cacheControlHeader - The cache control header value.
      defaultWriter - The default writer.
      withStackTrace - Should stack traces be sent to the client?
      withServletName - Should the servlet name be included?
      logger - A logger.
      overrideWriters - A list of prefix, writers to override output type for paths. May be null.

    • ErrorHandler

      public ErrorHandler()
      Creates an error handler with default values.

      Returns:
